Quick call for SpatRaster with a window

rast_short.Rd

Quick call for SpatRaster with a window

Usage

rast_short(rasterpath = NULL, win = NULL)

Arguments

rasterpath

character(1). Path to the raster file.

win

Named integer vector (4) or terra::ext() results.

Value

SpatRaster object.

Author

Insang Song

Examples

library(terra)
bcsd_path <- system.file(package = "stars", "nc/bcsd_obs_1999.nc")
ext_small <- terra::ext(
  c(xmin = -80, xmax = -76, ymin = 35, ymax = 36)
)
rast_short(bcsd_path, ext_small)
#> class       : SpatRaster 
#> dimensions  : 8, 32, 24  (nrow, ncol, nlyr)
#> resolution  : 0.125, 0.125  (x, y)
#> window      : -80, -76, 35, 36  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : lon/lat WGS 84 
#> sources     : bcsd_obs_1999.nc:pr  (12 layers) 
#>               bcsd_obs_1999.nc:tas  (12 layers) 
#> varnames    : pr (monthly_sum_pr) 
#>               tas (monthly_avg_tas) 
#> names       : pr_1, pr_2, pr_3, pr_4, pr_5, pr_6, ... 
#> unit        : mm/m, mm/m, mm/m, mm/m, mm/m, mm/m, ... 
#> time (days) : 1999-01-31 to 1999-12-31
